attributes.action: Stop those who are trying to stop the right to marriage for members of the LGBT.
attributes.additional_details: Gay marriage is now lawful under the Marriage (Same Sex Couples) Act 2013.
attributes.background: For years people part of the LGBT community have been fighting for the acceptance they deserve. The right to marriage is one of the standard rights each and every UK citizen has so why do they deserve to be sectioned out? This is not fair nor is it right. It needs to be stopped.
